text.text: عن ابن عمر رضي الله عنهما، قال‏:‏ كان رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم يعتكف العشر الأواخر من رمضان‏.‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏
The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to observe I`tikaf in the last ten days of Ramadan. [Al-Bukhari and Muslim].
The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to observe I`tikaf in the last ten days of Ramadan. [Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

narrated.text: Ibn `Umar (May Allah be pleased with them) reported:
Ibn `Umar (May Allah be pleased with them) reported:

text.text: وعن عائشة رضي الله عنها أن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم كان يعتكف العشر الأواخر من رمضان، حتى توفاه الله، تعالى ثم اعتكف أزواجه من بعده‏.‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏

The Prophet (ﷺ) used to engage himself in I'tikaf (seclusion for prayers) in the mosque during the last ten nights of Ramadan till he passed away; thereafter, his wives followed this practice after him. [Al- Bukhari and Muslim].

The Prophet (ﷺ) used to engage himself in I'tikaf (seclusion for prayers) in the mosque during the last ten nights of Ramadan till he passed away; thereafter, his wives followed this practice after him. [Al- Bukhari and Muslim].

narrated.text: 'Aishah (May Allah be pleased with her) reported:
'Aishah (May Allah be pleased with her) reported:

text.text: وعن أبي هريرة رضي الله عنه قال‏:‏ كان النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم يعتكف في كل رمضان عشرة أيام، فلما كان العام الذي قبض فيه اعتكف عشرين يومًا ‏(‏‏(‏رواه البخاري‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
The Prophet (ﷺ) used to observe I'tikaf every year (during Ramadan) for ten days; in the year in which he passed away, he observed I'tikaf for twenty days. [Al-Bukhari].
The Prophet (ﷺ) used to observe I'tikaf every year (during Ramadan) for ten days; in the year in which he passed away, he observed I'tikaf for twenty days. [Al-Bukhari].
